item.description:
Moving to 3/22/08, can you come?

There are tons of movies with knitting scenes. How about a Saturday Knitting Film Festival? We could start around 1pm, order pizza for dinner and watch a few movies while we knit along. As long as no one objects to my two cats, we can kick Steve out and take over my living room.

These are the top choices from the poll and we'll be watching them on Saturday March 29th.

Holiday -1938 Cary Grant -Romance

Raising Helen -2004 Kate Hudson -Comedy

Like Water for Chocolate -1993 Lumi Cavazos -Foreign

Breakfast at Tiffanys -1961 Audrey Hepburn -Romance

Anne of Green Gables -1985 Megan Follows -Drama
item.name: Saturday Afternoon Film Festival!
